name: Grolier Online Passport
description: **Please note that this database is part of the NovelNY database package and is therefore only available to users within the NYUNY network. Questions can be directed to our Ask a Librarian page.** Grolier Online Passport includes eight encyclopedia databases: Encyclopedia Americana, Grolier Multimedia Encyclopedia, The New Book of Knowledge, La Nueva Enciclopedia Cumbre, America the Beautiful, Lands and Peoples,Amazing Animals and The New Book of Popular Science.
